doc:
Isaac C. Singleton Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isaac_C._Singleton_Jr. 0 Isaac Charles Singleton Jr. is an American actor. He is best recognized for portraying the irate air marshal in Anger Management and the pirate Bo'sun in Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl. He also voiced the villainous Thanos in the television series Avengers Assemble and Guardians of the Galaxy as well as the video game Lego Marvel's Avengers. Singleton also shares the screen with Ryan Reynolds in the action comedy film Deadpool. Isaac_Charles_Singleton_Jr. is an_American_actor . He is_best_recognized for portraying the_irate_air_marshal in Anger_Management and the_pirate_Bo_'_sun in Pirates of the_Caribbean : The_Curse of the_Black_Pearl . He also voiced the_villainous_Thanos in the_television_series_Avengers_Assemble and Guardians of the_Galaxy as_well_as the_video_game_Lego_Marvel 's_Avengers . Singleton also shares the_screen with Ryan_Reynolds in the_action_comedy_film_Deadpool .
